description:
TRESEMM SHAMPOO CLEANSE REPLENISH 940 ML

TRESemms Cleanse Replenish Shampoo is specially formulated for oily hair Our shampoo with MultiVitamins Grape Seed Oil cleanses away any build up and hydrates your hair for everyday shine and freshness Free from parabens alcohol and dyes this shampoo is gentle enough for daily use so you can reveal fresh clean purified hair everyday Since our salon beginnings in 1948 TRESemm has been creating professional quality hair care products to help you achieve the look and style you want every time TRESemm understands how great hair gives you the confidence to walk taller every day Inspired by stylists and tested in salons the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day They are salon quality formulas without the salon price tag TRESemm does not test on animals and is PETA approved worldwide Bottles are made in Australia with 50 Australian Recycled Plastic and are recyclable Directions Apply to wet hair lather then rinse thoroughly Follow with TRESemm Cleanse Replenish Conditioner and style with your favourite TRESemm products For more secrets from our professional stylists and details on TRESemm styling appliances tools visit wwwtresemmecomau Professional quality at your fingertips Can cause eye irritation In case of contact with eyes rinse thoroughly with water

Deeply Cleanses Purifies for everyday shine and freshness

For Oily Hair

Salon Quality Formula and PETA Approved

With MultiVitamins Grape Seed Oil

No Parabens Alcohol or Dyes

Made in Australia with 50 Australian Recycled Plastic
name: Tresemme Cleanse & Replenish Shampoo 940ml
